author: NASA

resources.description:
Description
---------------

The .txt file contains 173405 rows of level 2 TCO data that are available for October 1st, 1988. The file contains 6 columns.

- scan:   scan number
- lon:      longitude
- lat:       latitude
- size:
- angle:
- ozone: TCO level 2 data
resources.name: Ozone data used in Cressie and Johannesson (2008)
Ozone data used in Cressie and Johannesson (2008)

organization.description: The National Institute for Applied Statistics Research Australia (NIASRA) is a research institute based at the University of Wollongong, Australia. It aims to identify Australia as a place where the discipline of applied statistics collaborates with academics and professionals in science, government, business and industry to tackle strategic problems. More information on NIASRA can be found at http://niasra.uow.edu.au/what-is-niasra/index.html
organization.title: NIASRA
organization.name: niasra

name: total-column-ozone-data-from-the-nimbus-7-polar-orbiting-satellite
notes:
Description
---------------

The CSV file contains 173405 rows of level 2 TCO data obtained using the Nimbus-7 polar orbiting satellite on October 1st, 1988. 

Format
----------

The file contains 6 columns.

- scan:   scan number
- lon:      longitude
- lat:       latitude
- size:    (please ignore)
- angle:  (please ignore)
- ozone: TCO level 2 data

References
---------------

Cressie, Noel, and Gardar Johannesson. "Fixed rank kriging for very large spatial data sets." Journal of the Royal Statistical Society: Series B (Statistical Methodology) 70.1 (2008): 209-226.
title: Total Column Ozone data from the Nimbus-7 polar orbiting satellite.
